name: Candy Maza
description:
Match and collect 3 or more scrumptious candies in Candy Fever. Create sweet boosters to achieve highest score and win each puzzle. Join and spread the fun in amazing Candy MAZA!

Candy MAZA Features 
* Journey through more than Unlimited levels. 
* Show off your gaming progress on leader board
* Explore a sweet world of delicious candies
* Never ending fun of match-3 puzzle game
* challenging different match 3 levels
* Slide, swap, switch and match 3 or more same sweet candies
* You will be able to get a special candy if 4 or more candies are match
* Helping lovely candy fairy to crush the new delicious adventure!
* Play anywhere anytime: Internet is not a must
* Completely FREE match 3 candy game

Are you ready to join Candy MAZA? 

Try exciting Candy MAZA and test your matching skill with interesting yet challenging candy levels!
